response.original_title: 2002 FIFAワールドカップ 韓国/日本/2002 FIFA 월드컵 한국/일본
response.overview: The 2002 FIFA World Cup was the 17th staging of the FIFA World Cup which took place from 31 May to 30 June 2002 in South Korea and Japan. It was the first World Cup to be held in Asia, the first to be held on a continent other than Europe or the Americas, the last World Cup during which the golden goal rule was in force and the only World Cup to be jointly hosted by more than one nation as FIFA amended its statutes in 2004 to officially forbid co-hosting bids.
response.title: FIFA 2002 Korea/Japan World Cup Opening Ceremony
